loans.name: Feryal

texts.en: Feryal is a 30-year-old single lady living with her four siblings and parents. To participate in bringing more income to the family, Feryal started a small clothing sales business at home a few years ago. She sells basic children's and teenagers' clothes. Now she wants to get a new collection of winter clothing items and that is why she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to get a new collection of winter clothing items

loans.name: Osman's Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers of a primary school in Kenema, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone to request for a loan of 5,100,000 SLL. With the help of this loan, these teachers will be able to solve their immediate financial needs. And at the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

David is the featured leader of this group of teachers. He is 44 years of age. David is a native of Boajibu. He is married to a housewife and they have six children who are attending primary and secondary schools. David has served in the teaching profession for 14 years now. He has requested this loan in order to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Khadeejah

texts.en:
Khadeejah is a 28-year-old married woman who declined to have her photo taken for religious reasons. She asked her husband, who is also her partner, to be in the photo instead.

Having no kids until now has given Khadeejah and her husband the opportunity to expand their business in a short amount of time. They work in a farming business. They own a few plant nurseries and grow different types of plants and herbs for resale. Now Khadeejah wants to get more agricultural seedlings using this youth loan in order to expand their business and have more variety in what they grow.

loans.use: to get more agricultural seedlings

loans.name: Faten

texts.en:
Faten is a 35-year-old conservative woman. She asked her husband to appear in this photo instead of her for religious reasons.

Faten enjoys sewing, tailoring, making clothes, and adding artistic touches to any piece of cloth she has. So, five years ago she decided to turn her hobby into a business that would not only make her happy doing it, but also bring her an income to improve her life. She started by buying a sewing machine and some thread. Then, she informed all her neighbors that she had started a tailoring business in case they had any torn clothing. And since then, she has grown her business and contributed additional support income to her family and to her business.

Now, Faten has applied for this loan to buy more fabric, thread, and some beads to increase her productivity in designing and tailoring clothes and dresses. She hopes to open her own clothing shop where she can show and sell her designs.

loans.use: to buy more fabric, thread, and some beads to increase her productivity in designing and tailoring clothes and dresses

loans.name: Saif

texts.en:
Saif is a 42-year-old married man. He has a small business with the help of his father that brings him another source of income besides his salary. 

He makes different types of crafts; most of them are antique designs. He even makes different sizes of aquariums as shown in the photo.

Now Saif has applied for this loan to buy new drilling and carving tools and more coloring sprays.

(Saif asked his father to appear in the photo instead of him for security reasons as he serves in the military and is not allowed to show his face.)

loans.use: to buy new drilling and carving tools and more coloring sprays.

loans.name: Saja

texts.en:
Saja is a 19-year-old married lady with no children. Saja did not let the fact that she got married early stop her from getting her bachelor's degree,

She is studying to become a teacher. Now she has applied for this loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
After collecting her previous loan, Iman added more food products to the store, which helped her to attract more customer in the neighborhood. 

This still did not satisfy Iman, so she applied for another youth loan in order to add more non-food goods to the store so she would have a variety of products.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her store.

loans.name: Fayzeh

texts.en:
Again Fayzeh asked her daughter Majd to take her place in the photo for religious reasons.

Majd has passed her second year in the university. Fayzeh is applying for another loan to continue supporting her daughter in her studies until she graduates.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's semester fees.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen is a 44-year-old married woman taking care of her four children. 

She got an early retirement so she could start her small business at home, which is selling clothes, blankets and home appliances. 

Now she has applied for a loan to increase the quantity she has of clothing items as she wants to get a new winter collection.

loans.use: to get a new winter clothing collection.

loans.name: Naser

texts.en:
Naser is a 20-year-old single man who lives with his five siblings and parent. 

He goes to the governmental university to study accounting. Naser also works to be able to pay for a part of the university fees so he can get his bachelor's degree. 

Today Naser has applied for an educational loan in hopes that it will help him pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer, a 29-year-old married woman, is the mother of 6- and 2-year-old daughters and a 10-year-old son. 

Abeer’s husband is a driver, which is how he is supporting the family. 

Recently, Abeer chose to start selling accessories at home -- mostly fake golden ones -- that brought her a good number of customers in the neighborhood. 

She has applied for this youth loan to buy new designs of accessories to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy new designs of accessories to resell.

loans.name: Al-Shjah Group

texts.en:
Al-Shjah is a group that is composed of four women. They are from Hodiedh, Yemen, and they work together to help one another. They are hard-working, enterprising women who do not give up easily. 

Currently, they are requesting a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to increase their business levels. 

Ghzal is the leader of the group. She is 50 years old and a married woman who has four children. She started her business to sell incense and perfumes. For the last four years, she has been selling gas cylinders and clothes to customers, which has enabled her to develop a significant customer base. Her business has helped her to provide for her family. 

She is turning to AMB to request a loan of 50,000 YER because she has orders and would like to be able to fill them for her customers.

loans.use: to buy gas cylinders and clothes for resale.

loans.name: Abdulrahim

texts.en:
Abdulrahim is a 42-year-old married man with five children who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. 

He is an employee in a government association who gets a low salary. He is hardworking man. 

He suffers from rain leaking into his house. He applied for a loan of 250,000 YER to buy construction supplies for his home. He hopes to a build second floor to improve for his family's conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for his home.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: La cliente, Elena, es una señora de 24 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Francisco, la cliente se dedica a la producción de la leche cruda, en donde actualmente tiene 2 cabezas de ganado lechero en producción y 1 en gestación, y la leche que produce la cliente elabora quesillo, actualmente la cliente vive por la zona sur de la ciudad de Cochabamba, aproximadamente a 10 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive la cliente es propia y de su familia, la cliente vive con su esposo y sus hijos, el destino del nuevo crédito de la institución es para la compra de cabeza de ganado lechero, para aumentar sus ingresos  por la venta de quesillo, y de alguna u otra manera podrá satisfacer sus necesidades que tiene en su domicilio.
texts.en: The borrower, Elena, is a woman of 24. She is married to Francisco. Her business activity is producing raw milk, for which she now has two head of milk cattle in production and one in gestation. She makes soft cheese from the milk that is produced. At the present time she lives in the southern zone of Cochabamba, about 10 km from the city of Cocahbamba. The house where she lives is hers and her family's. She lives with her husband and children. The new loan from the institution is destined for the purchase of more milk cattle to increase her income through selling cheese, and in one way or another she will be able to met the needs that she has in her home.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Rokia

texts.fr:
Madame Rokia est agée de 42 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants résidant chez son époux dans une famille nucléaire Sanoubougou I à Sikasso (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Madame Rokia après avoir mené beaucoup d’activités sans succès, s’est initiée il maintenant 9 ans à la fabrique de savons qu’elle a appris auprès d’une amie. Elle mène son activité au domicile conjugal où elle est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, elle décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis plus de trois années où elle a bénéficié de cinq prêts solidaires (prêt du groupe) dans une association des femmes de son quartier (Association BRILLANT de Sanoubougou I). Ainsi, elle est à son premier prêt individuel qui lui permettra d’augmenter son fonds de roulement afin d’acheter des matières premières nécessaires (huile de coton, soude caustique, déchets d’huile de coton  et pâtes noires).
Elle compte acheter avec ce  prêt, 10 futs d’huile de coton, 10 futs des déchets d’huile de coton (pâtes noires), 3 sacs de soude caustique, 4 paquet de parfums et 4 chargements de charrette en bois de chauffe. Elle achète ses matières premières sur place et à Bobo Dioulasso (Burkina Faso) et après fabrication, elle les revend en détail à une clientèle composée généralement des femmes de sa localité.
Elle envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 195 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Rokia is 42 years old, married, and mother of two children living with her husband in a nuclear family in Sanoubougou I in Sikasso (third largest administrative region in the Republic of Mali).

After having tried her hand at many types of business without success, Rokia started making soaps nine years ago using a technique that she learned from a friend. She runs her business from her marital home, and she is is high demand due to the quality of her products. Three years ago, she decided to join the micro-finance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, in order to satisfy her growing customer base. She has received five group loans as a member of an association of women from her neighborhood (Association BRILLANT de Sanoubougou I). This is her first individual loan. The loan will allow her to increase her working capital so that she can buy the raw materials that she needs (cottonseed oil, lye, cottonseed oil waste, black soap paste).

She plans to use the loan to buy 10 containers of cottonseed oil, 10 containers of cottonseed oil waste (black soap paste), 3 bags of lye, 4 packets of scents, and 4 cartloads of firewood. She buys the raw materials in her local area and in Bobo Dioulasso (Burkina Faso). After making the soap, she sells it retail to a clientele made up mainly of women from her town.

With the loan, she expects to earn a monthly profit of 195,000 FCFA, which she will use mainly to grow her business, contribute to family expenses, and pay the interest on her loan.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making soap

loans.name: Remie

texts.en:
Remie is 56 years old,  and she resides at Amulung with her husband and children. She and her husband are both farmers who plant and harvest rice to sell. They have been growing rice to sell for more than 10 years. Remie wanted to increase crop production but had insufficient funds, so she is asking for a loan of PHP12,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and to pay farm laborers.  Remie hires additional laborers who help her family with farming activities such as sowing, tilling, planting and harvesting rice. 

Remie would like to keep acquiring a bountiful harvest for the overall benefit of the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide and  to pay farm laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the rice farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more pillows to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of charcoal to resell

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: ALICIA, ES UNA PERSONA JOVEN, VIVEN EN LA COMUNIDAD DE QUEBRADAS A 11 KM. DE LA  PROVINCIA DE MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA,   TIENE UN HIJO, AL PADRE DE SU HIJO TUVO QUE DEJARLO POR EL MAL TRATO QUE LES DABA A SUS HIJO Y A ELLA, AHORA  ELLA SOLA TIENE QUE MANTENER Y ALIMENTARLO A SU  HIJO. ESTA ÉPOCA POR EL DESASTRE NATURAL DE LA SEQUIA SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA DE PAPA NO MADURO BIEN, ESTE DESASTRE LE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS QUE ELLA ESPERABA. ALICIA ES UNA PERSONA JOVEN ES  MUY QUERIDA Y RESPETADA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADA A SUS HIJO  Y SU TRABAJO QUE A VECES HASTA TIENE QUE TRABAJAR EN JORNAL EN LA AGRICULTURA PARA GANAR ALGUNOS PESOS Y ASÍ MANTENER A SU HIJO, ELLA ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA   COMPRAR  SEMILLAS DE MANÍ Y FREJOL Y ABONOS ORGÁNICO,  PARA MEJORAR SUS CULTIVOS  Y DE ESTA MANERA AUMENTAR SU PRODUCCIÓN PARA MEJORAR SUS INGRESO ECONÓMICO Y  DARLE ASÍ UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA A SU HIJO Y QUE EL PUEDA ASISTIR A LA ESCUELA  EN MEJORES CONDICIONES.  EL CRÉDITO AYUDARA MUCHO A SU HIJO Y A ELLA EN EL DURO TRABAJO QUE REALIZA.
texts.en:
Alicia is a young woman who lives in the community of Quebradas, 10 km from Mizque province in the department of Cochabamba. She has a son but had to leave the father because of his mistreatment of them both. Now Alicia has the sole responsibility of caring for and feeding her son. 

Because of the recent drought the potatoes which she grows on her small parcel of land  did not mature properly. This natural disaster resulted in a diminished income, money that she was expecting.

Alicia is a well-liked and respected person in the community where she lives because of her dedication to her son and to her work. Sometimes she even has to take on day labouring jobs on the land to earn a little money to care for her son. She is seeking a loan to buy peanut and bean seeds and organic fertilizer to improve her crops. In this way she will increase production and earn more money. In turn this will lead to an improved standard of living and her son will be better able to attend school. The loan will help Alicia and her son greatly with their difficult life.

loans.use: To buy bean and peanut seeds, and organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es: ROSMERY, ES UNA PERSONA TRABAJADORA, YA MAYOR  DE 55 AÑOS VIVE JUNTAMENTE CON SU ESPOSO  EN LA PROVINCIA DE MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA,   POR EL ABANDONO Y MIGRACIÓN DE SUS HIJOS QUE ELLOS SALIERON EN BUSCA DE MEJORES CONDICIONES DE VIDA Y  SE OLVIDARON  DE SUS PADRES ROSMERY QUEDO SOLA YA QUE ELLA SUFRE DE UNA ENFERMEDAD DE CÁNCER.  ROSMERY  PESE A SU ENFERMEDAD QUE PADECE  TIENE QUE TRABAJAR  SOLA  Y MANTENER A SU ESPOSO POR LA EDAD YA NO PUEDEN REALIZAR TRABAJOS CON MUCHO ESFUERZOS,  ELLA  ES MUY QUERIDA Y RESPETADA EN LA ZONA DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADA A SU  TRABAJO Y SU  ESPOSO.  ELLA ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA HACER REFACCIONAR LA CASA DONDE CONSTRUYERON CON MUCHO SACRIFICIO JUNTAMENTE CON SU ESPOSO SU ACTIVIDAD PRINCIPAL DE ROSMERY  ES LA ATENCIÓN DE SERVICIO DE VENTA DE COMIDA. ELLA NECESITA MEJORAR EL AMBIENTE DONDE VENDE SUS COMIDAS PARA AUMENTAR SU VENTA Y ASÍ DE ESTA MANERA MEJORAR SUS INGRESO ECONÓMICO. ELLA TIENE GASTOS DIARIOS EN MEDICAMENTOS, CON EL CRÉDITO QUE ESTA SOLICITANDO AYUDARA MUCHO A MEJORAR SU SALUD Y SU VIDA.
texts.en:
55-year old Rosmary is a hardworking person; she and her husband live in Mizque province in the department of Cochabamba. Their children have left home in search of a better life and have forgotten their parents. Rosmery feels abandoned and she also suffers from cancer. In spite of her illness she has to work and look after her elderly husband. They can no longer work very hard.

Rosmery is well-liked and respected in the area where she lives for her dedication to her work and to her husband. She is seeking a loan to make improvements to their house which they built with much hard work.

Rosmery's main source of income is selling food. She needs to improve the place where she sells the food and thus earn more many. She also has medicines to buy on a daily basis. The loan she is asking for will help her greatly to improve her life and health.

loans.use: Repair her house

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Cirila, ella pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.  La socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora pues continúa con su actividad comercial en la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo,  Cirila está solicitando el préstamo para comprar mercadería como cosméticos en general, perfumería y maquillaje y capitalizar su actividad para la próxima campaña navideña que acaba de comenzar.
Cirila está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y desarrollarse en su actividad comercial.
texts.en:
This borrower, Cirila, belongs to the bank "Manos Juntas/ Hands Together" in the city of Cuzco, Peru. She is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial woman. She continues with her commercial activities selling beauty products by catalogue. 

Cirila is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as general cosmetics, perfumes and makeup. She wants to capitalize on the upcoming Christmas campaign that has just begun. 

Cirila is very happy and thankful to KIVA for allowing her to support herself and to develop her commercial activity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as perfume and makeup.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
Noel is a responsible man who lives simply in Amulung. He is 47 years old, married and has five children,  two of whom are attending school, while the rest have settled into marriage. 

Noel has inherited a half hectare ricefield from his parents, where he has planted and harvested rice for more than 10 years. He usually earns about PHP 10,000 in each harvest season (twice a year), which goes for education and his family's sustenance. 

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to invest in ensuring healthy crops in his rice field. He will buy fertilizer and insecticide to use in farming.

In the future, Noel hopes to keep achieving a good harvest and to save funds as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide to use in farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of beverages to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials needed for manicures and pedicures.

loans.name: Ronalyn

texts.en:
Ronalyn is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 as added capital in her AVON cosmetics-selling business to increase her sales. She will buy AVON products such as lipstick, lotion, fragrances and apparel. She also will use some of the amount as start-up capital in her food, snack-selling business.

Ronalyn was engaged early and was just married. She is 18 years old and she is doing an AVON and NATASHA dealership to have income. Her husband, on the other hand, serves as an on-call truck driver at PHP 350 per day. 

In the future, Ronalyn hopes to establish a sustainable business for the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy AVON cosmetics such as lipstick, lotion and fragrances to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dried fish to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients like meat, vegetables, and spices for making viands.

loans.name: Lorly

texts.en:
Due to lack of job opportunities, Lorly engages in a business to help her husband in generating income for their family. She runs a small variety store in their community, selling different grocery items, soft drinks and frozen foods. 

She aims to make the business viable and profitable in order to earn sufficient income to satisfy their necessities and finance the education of her child. She and her husband are aiming for a happy and successful life in order to give their child a better life.  

To achieve their goals, Lorly aims to improve her variety store and to generate a higher income. She is requesting additional capital of PHP 40,000 to buy additional stocks of soft drinks, beverages, seasonings, soaps, junk foods, canned goods, seasonings and frozen foods for sale. 

Lorly believes that this financial support will enable her to improve the business. She hopes that she will achieve her goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of soft drinks, beverages, seasonings, soaps, junk foods, canned goods, seasonings and frozen foods for sale.

loans.name: Norlyn

texts.en:
Norlyn is from the village of Zamora. She is 34 years old and is married to Rodrigo. 

To make a living, Norlyn has engaged herself in selling used clothes or "ukay-ukay" in their village. She usually sells pants and kiddie dresses in small amounts. She has been in her business for six years and earns about PHP 1,500 a week. 

At this moment, Norlyn is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 to buy more t-shirts, pants and more used clothes to sell. She hopes for the development of her precious business in order to provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy more t-shirts, pants and more used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen, 51, lives in Zamora. She is in the business of selling food. The business is based in their house. She is thankful for the business she started because she has improved their economic situation. She works hard every day with the desire to upgrade her income. 

In addition to these efforts, she is seeking additional working capital from ASKI in order to provide her customers with their desired products. She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy meat, chicken, liver, hot-dogs and fish to sell. 

With the loan, Helen is hoping for a better lifestyle and business situation.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, liver, hot-dogs and fish to sell.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en: Leticia is 50 years old. She is engaged in a "buying and selling" business. Leticia is a single, but still she works hard for her family. Leticia wants to buy more products to sell. As a result, Leticia is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to buy fish such as milkfish and tilapia to resell . She believes that she can improve her business through her patience and strong determination.

loans.use: to buy fish such as milkfish and tilapia to resell

loans.name: Liberty

texts.en: Liberty is 53 years old and operates a sari-sari store. She sells canned goods, cooking oil, and soft drinks. She has had this business for three years. She is aiming for a higher income to improve her family's living conditions, but she suffers from insufficient funds. So, Liberty is now requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, shampoo, bath soap, and beverages. Liberty hopes for the further improvement of her business in order to achieve better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, shampoo, bath soap, and beverages

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en: Luzviminda is 32 years old. She is married and has one child. They live in Zamora. She sells fish while her husband manages their rice fields. He also helps her with selling fish within their village. Luzviminda uses her income to pay the electric bill and for her family's daily needs. Due to the high cost of basic commodities, Luzviminda is requesting a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase fish such as tilapia and milkfish to sell. Luzviminda hopes to increase her profits so that she can sustain the financial needs of her family and save money for the future. She believes that through her patience in managing her business, she will be able to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fish such as tilapia and milkfish to sell

loans.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna is 49 years old and is married to Cenon. The couple is thankful, because they have been blessed with very kind children. Edna is involved in buying and selling fish in the local community. She wants to buy different kinds of fish to sell, but she lacks the necessary capital. Because of this, Edna is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy tilapia and milkfish to sell. She believes that the loan will help her to increase her income. She is hoping that she will earn a higher income to support her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy tilapia and milkfish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Due to the hardships of living, Marjorie didn’t pursue her studies in college. She helps her parents in gaining income to satisfy their necessities. She has been engaged in a hog-raising business for almost 2 years. She usually earns a profit of PHP 7,000 a month that she utilizes for their food, clothing, and saving for her future. 

Marjorie aims to raise more pigs to sell in the future but she does not have enough capital, therefore, she is requesting an additional loan of PHP 24,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will improve the business and make it more profitable in the future. 

Marjorie hopes that someday she will improve her business and their status of living as well.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es: Adriana de 40 años de edad es madre soltera de una adolescente de 15 años. Desde joven a laborado como vendedora en diferentes almacenes del municipio de Itagüí, Antioquia, Colombia. Hace 6 años tomó la decisión de independizarse y con los ahorros de tantos años de trabajo montó su propio negocio; venta de ropa y calzado. Esta actividad es su única fuente de ingresos y de sostenimiento de ella y su familia. Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará mercancía para la venta de fin de año, debido a que el comercio incrementa para esta fecha. Su mayor sueño es poderle ofrecer a su hija una buena educación y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Adriana is 40 years old and is a single mother to her 15 year old daughter. Since she was young she has worked as a seller in different shops in the municipality of Itagüí, Antioquia, in Colombia.

6 years ago she made the decision to become independent and with the money she had saved up over so many years of working, she set up her own business - selling clothes and footwear. This activity is her only source of income for her and her family.

Adriana is currently asking for a loan so that she can buy merchandise for her end of year sale, as business increases at this time. Her biggest dream is to be able to offer her daughter a good education and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy merchandise for her end of year sale.

loans.name: Efren

texts.en:
Efren, a farmer who lives in Anquiray with his three children, grows rice to sell. In business for 10 years now, he earns about P10,000 each harvest season. He is now requesting a loan of P20,000 to invest in maintaining the business. He will buy fertilizers and pesticides for use on his farm.

Efren hopes to keep improving crop production and become a properous farmer in their village someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for use in farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Alonso

texts.es: Alonso tiene 33 años de edad y es uno de los mejores en su oficio. Su disciplina y esmero le han enseñado que los sueños si se pueden cumplir, que no existe barrera más fuerte que a la que cada uno quiere limitarse. Desde niño se apasionó por la electrónica y aunque nunca pudo ir a una universidad por la situación económica de su familia, esto no fue un impedimento para que el aprendiera el oficio. Con la ayuda de amigos y conocidos logró convertirse en un experto en la reparación de electrodomésticos, actividad que le ha permitido brindarles a su esposa y a su hijo de tres años de edad una vida digna. Su mayor deseo es poder mejorar el servicio en su negocio y para ello se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de herramientas y repuestos necesarios para desempeñar de manera eficiente su actividad.
texts.en:
Alonso is 33 years old and one of the best in his trade. His self-discipline and dedication has taught him that dreams can come true and that no barriers exist apart from those that we limit ourselves with.

Since he was a boy he has been passionate about electronics and although he could never go to university due to his family's economic activity, this was not an obstacle to him learning the trade. With the help of friends and acquaintances, he managed to become an expert in repairing electronic appliances, which has allowed him to provide his wife and 3 year old daughter with a decent living.

His biggest wish is to be able to improve the service in his business. Because of this he is asking for a loan so that he can buy the necessary tools and spare parts to carry out his work efficiently.

loans.use: buy tools and spare parts.

loans.name: Sidi

texts.fr:
Né vers 1979 à LOFIGUE Cercle de KADIOLO,  SIDI est un homme marié et père de quatre enfants, il vit avec sa famille à Loulouni ville, une des  sous préfecture de la 3eme Administrative du MALI.
SIDI  mène cette activité d’achat et  vente d’essence, il y a environ six ans. Il jouit d’une forte réputation dans cette activité et reçoit beaucoup de commandes, mais ses ressources ne peuvent pas lui permettre de les satisfaire. C’est pour quoi, il a décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso. Il est à son deuxième, le prêt passé a été correctement remboursé.
Il compte acheter avec son prêt, quatre futs d’essence. Cela pour les revendre en  détail et au comptant à une clientèle mixte.
Il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 100.000 FCFA environs qui sera utiliser pour  contribuer aux dépenses de la famille, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité. 
Il compte devenir grossiste tout en ouvrant une station service à Loulouni pour mieux servir sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Born around 1979 in Lofigue in Kadiolo Cercle, Sidi is a married man and father to four children. He lives with his family in Louloni, one of the sub-prefectures of the third administrative region of Mali.

Sidi has been managing this business buying and selling gas for about six years. He enjoys a good reputation in this business and gets many orders, but his resources don't allow him to satisfy them. This is why he decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso. He is on his second loan. The previous loan was correctly repaid.

With his loan he plans to buy four barrels of gas, to resell them retail and for cash to a mixed clientèle.

He envisions making an average monthly profit of about 100,000 FCFA which will be used to contribute to the family expenses, pay the interest on his loan and invest the rest in his business.

He plans to become a wholesaler by opening a service station in Loulouni to better serve his clientèle.

loans.use: to buy fuel.

loans.name: Maria Charito

texts.en:
Due to insufficient income, Maria Charito engages in a hog-raising business to generate additional income for her family. She and her husband aimed to improve their business in order to continue sending their children to school and give them a bright future. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, they need to increase their income to so that they will cover their needs and finance the education of their children. 

To improve the business, Maria Charito is asking for additional capital of PHP 27,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. Through this loan, she believes that she will be able to increase the number of pigs she has available for sale. She hopes that she will make it a viable and profitable source of income.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Renato

texts.en:
Renato is a farmer who lives in Anquiray. He is 47 years old, married and has three children. Like him, his spouse is also a hog raiser. Together, they generate income for the family's sustenance, especially for education needs. He usually earns P 15,000 twice a year during the harvest season. 

Renato would like to increase his crop production, which is why he is requesting for a loan of P 20,000. He will use it to buy fertilizer and insecticide for his farming business. With the help of this loan, Renato will make improvements to his crop production, leading to an abundant harvest and more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for his farming business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of the computer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is aiming for a happy life and successful business in the future. She is 32 years old, married and has two children.

She runs a general store in their village to supplement her husband's income. She has been in the business for almost four years and usually earns a profit of P9,000 a month which she spends on their daily expenses and manages to save some for their future. 

Myrna aims to increase her product offering to satisfy her customers’ needs, but due to insufficient capital, she is requesting a loan for P40,000 to buy more stock of junk food, candy, canned goods, noodles, soaps, beverages, seasonings and soft drinks for resale. 

She believes that this loan will help her improve the business and hopes that she will make the business grow more profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of junk food, candy, canned goods, noodles, soaps, beverages, seasonings and soft drinks for resale

loans.name: Kounawolow Group

texts.fr:
Mme AWA SOPHIE représente le groupe KOUNAWOLOW. Elle se porte bien. Marié, elle est mère de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 31ans et le moins âgé a 16ans. 02 vont à l’école et elle à 02 personnes à sa charge.
Mme fait la restauration et vend parallèlement du savon depuis 16ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. Ses clients sont les voisins et organisateurs des cérémonies (car elle est recommander pour préparer lors des cérémonies).
Mme veut s’acheter 02 bidons de 05l d’huile, 25kg de riz, 04 cartons de savon et 02 plaquettes d’œufs.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut  épargner. Mme ambitionne ouvrir un restaurant et assurer la scolarité de son dernier  enfant.
texts.en:
Awa Sophie represents the group Kounawolow. She is well. Married, she is the mother of 5 children. The oldest is 31 years old and the youngest is 16 years old. Two go to school and she has two dependents.

Awa Sophie is a caterer and has also been selling soap for 16 years. She gets her supplies in the surrounding markets. Her customers are the neighbors and organizers of ceremonies (as she is recommended for preparations at the time of ceremonies).

Awa Sophie wants to buy herself 2 5L cans of oil, 25 kg of rice, 4 cartons of soap and 2 packs of eggs.

With her profits, she wants to save. Awa Sophie has the ambition of opening a restaurant and ensuring the education of her last child.

loans.use: to buy herself 2 5L cans of oil, 25 kg of rice, 4 cartons of soap and 2 packs of eggs.

loans.name: Nelcin Catalina

texts.es: Catalina de 32 años de edad se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer luchadora y recursiva, Capaz de ver en la dificultad grandes oportunidades. Comenzó su con su plan de negocios gracias a un préstamo que le hicieron con el cual montó una tienda para cubrir los gastos del hogar y sostener a su hija de 13 años. Hoy aún conserva su tienda y desea invertir en ella, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido y el pago de facturas vencidas. Su mayor anhelo es poder ver crecer su microempresa y convertirla en una gran tienda de abarrotes, espera que su situación económica mejore y poderle suministrar a su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Catalina, 32, is known for being a tenacious and resourceful woman.  She is able to see, even in a difficult situation, great opportunities.  She started her business with a loan that was provided to her.  With this sum of money, she started up a store so that she could cover the household expenses and support her 13 year-old daughter.  She still has this store, and she wants to invest in it.  This is the reason why she is requesting a loan.  She will use the loan to stock up the store and pay off some overdue bills.  Catalina's main wish is to be able to grow her small business and convert it into a big grocery store.  She hopes that her financial situation will improve, and that she will be able to provide her daughter with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store, and to pay off some overdue bills

loans.name: Rawelgboudou Group

texts.fr:
Mme RASMATA représente le groupe RAWELGBOUDOU. Elle se porte bien. Marié, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 17ans et le moins âgé a 06ans. 04 vont à l’école et elle à 08 personnes à sa charge.
Mme vend des gâteaux et bonbons depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son quartier. Ses clients sont les femmes, hommes et les enfants.
Mme veut s’acheter 03paquets de bonbons, 02sacs de farine de blé et ½ sac de sucre.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut  épargner. Mme ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique et assurer la scolarité de ses  enfants.
texts.en:
Rasmata represents the group Rawelgboudou. She is well. Married, she is the mother of 4 children. The oldest is 17 years old and the youngest is 6 years old. Four go to school and she has 8 dependents.

Rasmata has been selling cakes and candies for 11 years. She gets her supplies at the market in her neighborhood. Her customers are women, men and children.

Rasmata wants to buy herself 3 packages of candy, 2 bags of whole wheat flour and ½ bag of sugar.

With her profits, she wants to save. Rasmata has the ambition of opening a large store and ensuring the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy herself 3 packages of candy, 2 bags of whole wheat flour and ½ bag of sugar.

loans.name: Ethiopienne Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZENABO représente le groupe ETHIOPIENNE. Elle se porte bien. Marié, elle est mère d’un enfant. Ce dernier a 3 ans et il ne part pas à l’école. Elle  a 02 personnes à sa charge.
Mme fait la restauration (gâteaux croissants) depuis 02ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les boutiques environnantes. Ses clients sont les boutiquiers et les kiosques
Mme veut s’acheter 02 sacs de farines de blé, un bidon de 20l d’huile et un sac de sucre.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut  épargner. Mme ambitionne améliorer son activité (acheter des fours pour la préparation des gâteaux) et aider son mari pour les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Zenabo represents the group Ethiopienne. She is well. Married, she is mother to one child. He is 3 years old and doesn't go to school. She has 2 people under her care.

Zenabo has been a caterer (cakes and croissants) for 2 years. She gets her supplies in the surrounding stores. Her customers are the storekeepers and the kiosks.

Zenabo wants to buy herself 2 bags of wheat flour, one 20L can of oil and one bag of sugar.

With her profits, she wants to save. Zenabo has the ambition of improving her business (buying ovens for the preparation of cakes) and helping her husband with the family responsibilities.

loans.use: to buy herself 2 bags of wheat flour, one 20L can of oil and one bag of sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Deisy Amalia

texts.es: Deisy tiene 56 años de edad y desde joven se ha dedicado al oficio de la confección a terceros. Con esta actividad ella a logró sacar adelante a su familia debido a que es madre soltera. En su vida le ha tocado afrontar muchas dificultades económicas debido a que en este oficio dice ella “hay puntos muy críticos en los que te toca rebuscarte los clientes y en ocasiones no encuentras”. Pese  a las dificultades ella siempre tiene motivos para luchar y seguir adelante, hoy enfrenta otro obstáculo; la máquina, herramienta con  la que trabaja, se encuentra presentando algunas fallas en el motor, por lo cual necesita repararla para continuar con su labor. Por esta razón se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el que financiará la reparación del motor y comprará insumos para aprovechar la temporada de fin de año en incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Deisy is 56 years old and has worked making clothes for others since she was young.  Through this work she has been able to provide for her family while being a single mother.  In her life she has had to face many economic difficulties, due to the fact that in this line of work, as she says, "there are critical points when you have to really dig to find clients, and at times you find none."  In spite of the difficulties she always has motivation to fight and get ahead.  She now faces another obstacle; her sewing machine, the tool of her trade, is currently showing problems with the motor.  Because of this, she needs to repair it in order to continue with her work.  For this reason she is seeking the credit with which she will finance the repair of the motor. Also, she will buy supplies to take advantage of this end of the year season to raise her income.

loans.use: to repair her sewing machine's motor and buy supplies.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Ms Mariam is a 28-year-old mother of one. She has been operating a milk sales business for two years. Her husband is a factory worker but his income is not sufficient to meet the family's daily expenses. Mariam is eager to provide for her family through all her hard work. She initiated her business with the support of Kashf foundation and she has gained many customers. She has applied again for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo, which will increase her production of milk and her sales. Mariam desires to expand her business to support her family well.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Djouwera

texts.fr: Revendeuse d’ignames et de pagnes au marché de Hédzranawoé, Djouwera est marié et mère de 03 enfants. Son premier enfant a 25 ans et le dernier a 19 ans. Elle a entamé cette activité depuis 2000 et  profite des saisons d’abondances des produits agricoles pour faire son stock d’ignames. Elle sollicite son troisième prêt auprès de WAGES stocker de l’igname et acheter des pagnes cette période de fin d’année. Elle veut agrandir son activité mais souhaite aussi d’ouvrir d’autres points de vente afin de contribuer à l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Djouwera is a married mother of three children aged 19 to 25. She sells yams and pagnes at the market of Hédzranawoé, an activity she started in 2000. She replenishes her stock of yams when the produce is plentiful. 

With the year ending, she is seeking a third loan from WAGES to stock up on yams and to buy pagnes. She wants to expand her activity and to open more store locations. Her goal is to help ensure her family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy yams and pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Valeri

texts.en:
Valeri, 21 years old, is from a small village in the Kvareli district, Kakheti regioni, East Georgia. Ha lives with his wife, his parents and his grandfather, who collects a retirement pension. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they have 2 cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. They have a 0.5 hectare vineyard and 2 hectares of agricultural land, where they grow watermelons. Valeri gets a monthly income by using his tractor to provide services to the villagers.

Valeri is a very hardworking man who does his best to ensure a good harvest. He has requested a loan for cultivating his land. Once this is completed properly, Valeri will be able to sow watermelon seeds and sell the harvested products. It will increase the family's income and improve their living conditions. Valeri awaits your support.

loans.use: to cultivate the land and to sow watermelon seeds

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Ms Azra is a 54-year-old widow. She has been operating a business making boxes for 15 years. After her husband’s death, she faced many problems in running her household. She has five daughters and one son and there was no other source of income to provide her family with bread and butter. With the passage of time, Ms Azra has improved her business and gained a lot of regular customers. Her son also assists her with the business.

This is Ms Azra's second year with Kashf Foundation and she is happily running her business with their support. She has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy bundles of thick paper at lower rates from the market to enable her to complete orders on time. Ms Azra hopes to have an increase in sales. She desires to use the earned profits on her children’s education and growth.

loans.use: to buy bundles of thick paper at lower rates from the market.

loans.name: Tea

texts.en:
Tea, 27 years old, is from a small village in the Kvareli district, Kakheti region, East Georgia. She lives with her father and her grandfather, who collects a retirement pension. The family is involved in an agricultural business. They have a vineyard and sell harvested grapes locally at a good price. Each member of the family works hard to ensure a good harvest.

Tea has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers for the vineyard. After the vineyard is fertilized properly, the family will have a good quality harvest, which will increase their income and improve their living conditions. Tea awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for the vineyard

loans.name: Juvilyn

texts.en: Juvilyn, 30 years old, is married and has two very young children. The family lives harmoniously in a rural community, planting and harvesting corn and vegetables for sale. Due to living hardships, Juvilyn buys and sells plastic wares in their community to supplement her husband's income. She aims to improve the business to earn a sufficient income for her family. Juvilyn is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000.00 to buy more stock of  plastic wares such as containers, pails and basins, to resell. She believes that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business. Juvilyn hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of plastic wares such as containers, pails and basins, to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Horongna (La Dignité) Group

texts.fr:
Horongna est un regroupement de femmes de Hamdallaye qui se connaissent bien et vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 34 ans, sont mariées et ont en moyenne  4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels  le tissu, du bois de chauffe, du gombo, des produits de poterie, des produits cosmétiques,  etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur troisième  prêt de groupe. 
Korotoumou est un membre du groupe Horongna, assise au milieu, qui excelle dans la vente des cosmétiques.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, deux cartons de pommades pour la peau, 2 paquets de mèches et un carton de crèmes. Elle se procure de ces produits au marché de Koutiala. Elle vend ses articles en détail et au comptant dans un salon de coiffure à Hamdallaye, à domicile et en ambulant, à une clientèle essentiellement composée de féminine. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Horongna comptent réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 102 500CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle, Korotoumou  compte réaliser 140 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utiliseront une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnelles et augmenter leurs fonds de commerce. 
Korotoumou souhaite renforcer son partenariat avec Soro Yiriwaso pour que les stocks ne soient plus rares.
texts.en:
Horongna is a group of women from Hamdallaye who know each other well and live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other parents. They are on average 34 years old, married and have an average of 4 children each.

This group of women sells a variety of items such as fabric, firewood, gumbo, pottery products, cosmetics, etc.

To increase the size of their businesses, the members decided to join Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. They are on their third group loan.

Korotoumou is a member of the group Horongna. She is sitting in the middle, and excels in the sale of cosmetics.

She plans to use her loan to buy two cartons of skin creams, two packages of hair extensions and one carton of creams. She gets these products in the market in Koutiala. She sells these items retail for cash in a hair salon in Hamdallaye, from home and as an itinerant saleswoman, to a clientèle mostly made up of women.

While the other members of the group Horongna plan to make an average monthly profit of 102,500 FCFA each during this cycle, Korotoumou plans to make 140,000 FCFA.

In addition to repaying the loans, they will use part of the income to take care of their personal expenses and expand their businesses.

Korotoumou wishes to strengthen her partnership with Soro Yiriwaso so that her stock isn't as scarce.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Madéba

texts.fr: Madeba  est revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale. Âgée de 41 ans, elle est mariée à un agent de santé et mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés.  L’ainé est âgé de 16 ans et le dernier a 08 ans. Elle a débuté ce commerce en 2004 et dispose d’une boutique à cet effet.  Actuellement, elle est concurrencée par d’autres vendeurs qui disposent de plusieurs variétés de produits. Pour cela, elle sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour diversifier et augmenter ses produits de commerce. Elle veut débuter d’autres activités secondaires et s’occuper de l’avenir de ses enfants.
texts.en: Madéba is a reseller of general foodstuffs. Forty-one years old, she is married to a health official and mother to 3 children who are all in school. The oldest is 16 years old and the youngest is 8 years old. She started this business in 2004 and has a store for that purpose. Currently, she is in competition with other vendors who have a greater variety of products. Because of this, she is requesting her second loan with WAGES to diversify and increase her products to resell. She wants to start other secondary businesses and take care of the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy general foodstuffs.

loans.name: Seyni Marème

texts.fr: Monsieur Seyni marème est mariée et est employée municipal dans l'une des régions du Sénégal.Il est employé comme collecteur et exerce cette profession depuis 10 ans. Parallèlement  il détient un taxi  et ses revenus lui permettent de faire face a ses charges familiales quotidiennes et d’assurer l’entretien de son taxi.Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC  ou il a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Il sollicite un prêt de 500 000 frs prévu pour financer une élévation dans sa maison. Ce financement lui permettra de rénover sa maison  et d’améliorer le cadre de vie familial. Elle souhaite dans le futur disposer d’un immeuble commercial.
texts.en: Seyni Marème is married and is a municipal employee in one of the regions of Sénégal. He is employed as a collector and has been in this profession for 10 years. At the same time he owns a taxi and his income allows him to take care of his daily family responsibilities and to ensure the maintenance of his taxi. He is a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC to which he has already reimbursed a previous loan. He is requesting a loan of 500,000 frs to finance an elevation in his house. This financing will allow him to renovate his home and to improve the family's living environment. In the future he wishes to own a commercial building.

loans.use: to renovate his home.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en: Ms Musarat is 38 years old and married. She is a mother of three children, who all attend school. Her husband is a private employee. In order to contribute to the family income she has been running a beauty parlor for 15 years. She spends her earnings on her children's education and other needs. Musarat has been in association with Kashf for three years. She has applied for a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase some furniture, makeup kits and cleansers. She currently saves PKR 3000 to 4000 per month from her business and wishes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase some furniture, makeup kits and cleansers

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en:
Ms Rabia is a 28-year-old married woman. For the past 3 years, she has been doing hand-embroidery work with her husband, who has been attached to this work for many years. With Ms Rabia's additional help, her husband’s monthly profit has increased.

Ms Rabia is the mother of five children, three of them in school. She wants to cover the educational expenses of other children as well. Ms Rabia works day and night for her children's better future. She needs to purchase more embroidery materials, such as packs of sequins, spools of thread and glittering material. Ms Rabia has applied for a loan of PKR 15,000 to meet these business requirements. She expects profits from her business and intends to use them for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more embroidery materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned good, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en: Edelyn, 48 years old, is a very industrious entrepreneur. She is married and has five children. Edelyn operates a retail business. She wants to purchase additional goods for her store because her main source of income comes from selling different products. Edelyn is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy canned goods, spices, biscuits and noodles for her business. Hopefully, her loan request will be granted.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, spices, biscuits and noodles for her business

loans.name: Faizatou

texts.fr: Veuve en charge de 02 enfants, Faïzatou est âgée de 36 ans. Ses enfants  dont 01 scolarisé, sont successivement âgés de 16 et 10 ans. Elle a débuté la vente des céréales et d’igname en 2000 au marché. Face aux lourdes charges  de ses enfants, elle  désire agrandir son activité pour augmenter ses revenus. Elle sollicite donc son premier prêt auprès de WAGES. Elle prévoit réinvestir ses profits supplémentaires afin de développer son activité et assurer  l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en: A widow in charge of two children, Faïzatou is 36 years old. Her children of whom one goes to school are successively aged 16 and 10 years old. She started selling cereals and yams in 2000 at the market. Faced with the heavy responsibility of her children, she wants to expand her business to increase her income. She is thus requesting her first loan from WAGES. She plans to reinvest her supplementary profits in order to develop her business and ensure the self-fulfillment of her family.

loans.use: to buy cereals and yams and other items.

loans.name: Eliana Astrid

texts.es: Eliana es una mujer de 25 años de edad, visionaria, llena de grandes proyectos y con muchos ideales. Asegura que su mayor logro ha sido montar su negocio porque fue un sueño que creció en  su corazón desde su niñez. Considera que este logro ha sido la base y el motor que la impulsan a convertirse en una empresaria. Hoy tiene una tienda de videojuegos la cual espera expandir. Por esta razón se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que utilizará para comprar dos T.V y dos play station 3, con el fin de satisfacer la demanda en el sector. Su mayor anhelo es poderle brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Eliana is a 25 year old woman, a visionary full of large projects and lots of ideals.

She says that her biggest achievement has been to set up her business because it was a dream that had grown in her heart since her childhood. She considers that this achievement has been the foundation and the motor that drove her to become a businesswoman.

Today she has a video game shop which she hopes to expand. For this reason she is asking for a loan that she will use to buy two televisions and two PlayStation 3s, with the aim of satisfying the demand in the sector. Her biggest wish is to be able to provide her family with a better quality of life and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy two televisions and two PlayStation 3s.

loans.name: Gracelyn

texts.en: Every individual aims to become successful and financially stable in life. Likewise, Gracelyn aims to become successful in the future. She is 27 years old, married and has one infant-age child. Due to the lack of job opportunities, she runs a small variety store in their village to generate income. She aims to improve the business and make it a viable source of income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of 25,000.00 PHP to buy sugar, noodles, canned goods, biscuits, eggs, cooking oils, frozen foods, soaps and beverages to sell. Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will make an improvement in the business and hopes that she will achieve her goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, canned goods, biscuits, eggs, cooking oils, frozen foods, soaps and beverages to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of a motorcycle

loans.name: Aissatou

texts.fr: Couturière de profession, Aïssatou exerce cette activité depuis 2008 dans son atelier où il associe également le commerce des articles de mercerie. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Dans le souci de renforcer son activité secondaire, elle sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour l’achat des articles de mercerie. Elle compte réinvestir ses profits dans l’activité et développer ce dernier pour assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Aïssatou is a seamstress by training.  She has been involved in this activity since 2008 and she works in her shop, where she also sells sewing supplies.

She is married and the mother of three children.  Eager to boost her secondary activity, she is requesting her first loan from WAGES.  She will use this loan to buy sewing supplies.

She plans to reinvest her profits in her business and to develop her activity in order to make sure that her family continues to thrive.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Elise

texts.fr: Boulangère de profession, Elise est âgée de 38 ans. Elle est mariée à un enseignant et mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle exerce cette activité depuis 2007 à domicile. Le premier et le dernier enfant sont respectivement âgés de 13 et 07 ans. Pour faire face à la demande croissante de ses clients, elle sollicite son troisième prêt auprès de WAGES. Cet argent lui servira à acheter les ingrédients tels que la farine de blé, le sucre etc. Elle compte utiliser ses revenus pour  agrandir son activité et  assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Elise is 38 years old and she is a baker by profession.  She is married to a teacher and the mother of three children who all go to school.  She has been involved in this activity since 2007, working from home.  Her oldest and youngest children are 13 and 7 years old respectively.

In order to meet the increasing demand from her customers, she is requesting her third loan from WAGES.  This loan will be used to buy such ingredients as wheat flour, sugar etc.

She plans to use her earnings to expand her activity and to meet her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour and sugar.

loans.name: Emilse Andrea

texts.es: Emilsen de 34 años de edad es casada y tiene dos hijos de 2 y 6 años, Se dedica a las labores del hogar, alternándolo con la venta de ropa y accesorios por catálogo, actividad que le genera ingresos y le permite ayudar a su cónyuge con los gastos familiares, Su mayor sueño es poder tener un negocio propio con el fin de mejorar su situación económica y brindarle a sus hijos una buena educación. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de mercancía para la temporada de fin de año y poder regalarles a sus hijos un buen aguinaldo.
texts.en:
Emilsen is 34 years old, is married and has two children who are two and six years old. She is dedicated to the housework, alternating it with the sale of clothing and accessories by catalog. This activity generates income that allows her to help her partner with the household expenses. Her biggest dream is to own a business in order to improve their economic situation and provide a good education to their children.

She is currently requesting a loan which will be invested in the purchase of merchandise for the year-end season so she will be able to give her children a good Christmas gift.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing).

loans.name: María Ángela

texts.es: María Ángela es una mujer digna de admiración, su valentía y esfuerzo han sido los responsables de su éxito. Desde hace 40 años se dedica a la elaboración de comidas rápidas. Comenzó vendiendo chuzos en el centro de la ciudad de Medellín, Colombia. Posteriormente se consiguió una olla y un fogón para combinar los chuzos con patacones, con el tiempo y los ahorros que lograba hacer se compró el carro de comida rápida y amplió la oferta de productos. Labora todos los días de 4 a 11 de la noche con la ayuda de su hijo. Se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito para la compra de materia prima y una mesa para ofrecerles a sus clientes una mejor calidad en el servicio. Su mayor sueño es poder montar su negocio en un local, generar empleo y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María Ángela is worth admiring. She is brave and hardworking, which is why she has succeeded. She has been selling fast food for forty years now. She started selling brochettes in downtown Medellín (Colombia). She then bought a pot and a stove and besides brochettes, she started selling fried plantains. With time, and thanks to her savings, she bought a portable stall and started offering a wider variety of products.

She works every day, 4 am to 11 pm, and her son helps her. She is now requesting a loan to buy ingredients and a table, in order to be able to offer her customers a better service. Her biggest dreams are to get her own establishment, create job opportunities and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and a table.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Esperanza es madre de tres hijos menores de edad, los cuales son su motivación y la razón por la que decidió montar su propio negocio. Laboró por varios años en tiendas de abarrotes las cuales le permitieron adquirir la experiencia. Después de que tuvo sus hijos se vio en la necesidad de retirarse por el tiempo que demandaba su cuidado. Hace dos años decidió montar su proyecto de negocio en su casa y poder combinar las labores del hogar, el cuidado de sus hijos y la actividad laboral. Su mayor deseo es que su tienda crezca, incremente el número de clientes y mejore la rentabilidad. Para ello se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que desea comprar surtido para satisfacer la demanda.
texts.en: Esperanza is the mother of three minor children. They are her motivation and the reason why she decided to start her own business. She worked for many years in small grocery stores, which allowed her to gain experience. After she had her children, she found it necessary to stop working for awhile to care for them. Two years ago, she decided to start her business in her home and combine her housework, caring for her children, and her work. Her greatest wish is that her store grows, the number of customers increases, and the profitability increases. This is why she is applying for a loan, with which she wants to buy inventory to meet the demand.

loans.use: to buy a supply of basic household goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertiliser and to improve his crops.

loans.name: Jamollidin

texts.ru: Джамоллидину 49 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и имеет более чем 15 лет опыта в бизнесе. Он занимается куплей продажей продукты питания в продовольственном магазине. В последнее время у него мало клиентов, так как конкуренция большая, и он не может придерживать своих клиентов, которые делают покупки в новых супермаркетов. Он должен срочно расширить свой ассортимент для того, чтобы вернуть своих клиентов. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для того, чтобы купить хлеб, масло, колбасные изделия, консервы, напитки и молочные продукты. Он надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Jamollidin is 49 years old, married, and is raising three children.  He is a very hardworking man and has more than 15 years experience in business.  He is engaged in the grocery business.  Recently, he has had few customers, as there is a great deal of competition and he can't keep his clients who are shopping in the new grocery stores.  He urgently needs to expand his assortment of goods in order to get his clients back. 

Jamollidin is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni (TJS) to buy bread, butter, sausage, canned goods, beverages, and dairy products.  He is relying on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy food items for widening the assortment of his goods

loans.name: Samuel

texts.fr: Samuel est  marié et père de 03 enfants tous scolarisés.  Le premier de ses enfants a 19 ans et le dernier a 12 ans. Il revend de céréales et épices à son domicile mais  aussi par  livraison à domicile des commandes.  Il sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour acheter des marchandises et agrandir l’activité. Il souhaite avoir d’autres points de distribution et assurer l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Samuel is married and the father of three children who all go to school.  His oldest child is 19 years old; the youngest is 12.  He resells grains and spices from home, and also delivers his customers' orders directly to their houses.  He is requesting his first loan from WAGES to buy some goods and expand his activity.  He would like to have other distribution points and wants to make sure that his family continues to thrive.

loans.use: to buy grains, onions and potash.

loans.name: Mukima

texts.ru: Мукима получает кредит для приобретения продуктов питания  на зиму.   У нее есть столовая и она готовит разные национальные блюда.    Зимой продукты стоят очень  дорого поэтому она   каждый раз делает запас на зиму. На полученный кредит   Мукима    планирует купить   несколько килограмм лука, масло, рис и картошку.  Она одна воспитывает 5 детей.   В настоящее время ее невестка помогает в развитии бизнеса.   Один  из сыновей находиться со своей семьей в РТ. Мукима очень  благодарна   МДО "Арвнад" за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mukima is receiving a loan for the purchase of food for the winter. She has a dining hall and she prepares different national dishes. 

In the winter, products are very expensive so she makes a stock every year for the winter. Mukima plans to use the received loan to buy a few kilograms of onions, oil, rice and potatoes. 

She is a single mother with five children. Currently, her daughter-in-law is helping her in developing the business. One of her sons is living with his family in the Russian Federation. 

Mukima is very grateful to MDO Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy food

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cows, calves and cattle feed

loans.name: Sakovat

texts.ru: Саковат жительница города Исфара. Ей 32 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Сковат занимается торговлей женской верхней одежды и тканей. Этим видом бизнеса она занимается шесть месяцев. Она берет кредит для покупки женской одежды.
texts.en:
Sakovat is a resident of the town of Isfara. She is 32 years old, married, and has four children. 

Sakovat trades in women's clothing and fabrics. She has been involved in this type of work for six months. She is taking a loan to buy women's clothing.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru: Абдулло проживает в районе Хамадони. Очередной кредит он берет для растениеводства. У Абдулло имеется орошаемая земля на 5 гектар. Он берет кредит для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений, чтобы посеять и получить хороший урожай пшеницы, а также овощей.
texts.en: Abdullo lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is taking another loan for his agricultural business.  He owns 5 hectares (12.35 acres) of irrigated land.  He will use this loan to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers, so that he can sow and get a good harvest of wheat and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers, which will allow him to sow and get a good harvest of wheat and vegetables.

loans.name: Akoua

texts.fr: Marié à un chauffeur, Akoua âgée de 45ans est revendeuse de chaussures de tous genres au marché. Ses 03 enfants sont tous scolarisés et l’ainé a 21 ans tandis que le benjamin a 15 ans. Dans le souci de satisfaire la demande de la saison des fêtes de fin d’année,  elle sollicite son second crédit auprès de WAGES  pour acheter de la marchandise. Elle veut agrandir son activité  et satisfaire tous ses clients. Elle souhaite assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille de façon pérenne.
texts.en: Married to a driver, Akoua is 45 years old and she resells all types of shoes at the market.  Her three children attend school.  The oldest is 21 years old, the youngest is 15.  Eager to meet her customers' demand during the Holiday Season, she is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy some merchandise.  She wants to expand her activity and satisfy all her clients.  She would like to be able to meet the basic needs of her family in a sustainable manner.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Navruz

texts.ru: Наврузу 36 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 6 лет назад он начал свой бизнес услугами таксиста.  Его эффективность помогает ему быть успешным в бизнесе, но его доход не позволяет ему обеспечить семью со всеми необходимыми средствами. С целью получения больше дохода он решил улучшить сервис. Его 4 дети  требуют много средств и современных технологий и поэтому он срочно должен расширить свой бизнес. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  3500 сомони для ремонта машины. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте, ему поможем держать свой стимул среди бизнесменов.
texts.en: Navruz is 36 years old.  He is married and is raising four children.  Six years ago, with the goal of providing his family with all the necessities, he began his business by providing taxi services.  His efficiency helps him to be successful in business, but his income doesn't let him provide his family with all the necessities. With the goal of increasing his income, he decided to improve his service.  His four children demand a lot of resources and new technology.  It's for this reason that he urgently needs to expand his business.  He sells his services at the local market and he has a large client base.  He is requesting a loan of 3500 somoni (TJS) for repairing his car.  He is awaiting your kindness.  Come on!  Let's help him keep up his motivation as a business man.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Chut

texts.en:
Chut was born in 1956. She has two children who are married; one is a bank employee, the other a plastic repairer. Her husband sells cassava flour. Chut makes and sells traditional sweet soups in a market. She has done this work for 2 years and earns 3,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,500,000 VND per month. 

Chut has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,528,000 VND to buy ingredients, bowls and spoons for her soup business. She wants to use the profits to enlarge her stall.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, bowls and spoons

loans.name: Shohuseyn

texts.ru: Шохусейн житель города Исфара. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Шохусейн мастер по починке электрических аппаратов, он работает в хозяйствах. Он в основном занимается ремонтом хозяйственных и других видов оборудований. В этой области Шохусейн два года. Он берет кредит для приобретения запчастей и инструментов.
texts.en:
Shohuseyn is a resident of the town of Isfara. He is 34 years old, married, and has three children. 

Shohuseyn is a master of repairing electrical equipment and he works on a farm. He is mainly engaged in repairing business and other types of equipment. Shohuseyn has two years of experience in this area. 

He is taking a loan for the purchase of spare parts and tools.

loans.use: to acquire spare parts and tools

loans.name: Zubaydullo

texts.ru: Зубайдулло житель района Хамадони. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Зубайдулло работает таксистом. В этой области он четыре года. Зубайдулло берет кредит для ремонта автомашины.
texts.en:
Zubaydullo is a resident of the Hamadoni region. He is 34 years old, married, and has six children. 

Zubaydullo works as a taxi driver. He has four years experience in this area. 

Zubaydullo is taking a loan to repair his automobile.

loans.use: to repair his automobile

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.ru: Ханифа жительница города Дангара. Она замужем. Ей 33 года. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Ханифа занимается торговлей. У нее имеется магазин, где она продает продукты питания. Торговлей Ханифа занимается десять лет. Она берет кредит для покупки женской, мужской и детской одежды, чтобы увеличить ассортимент товара.
texts.en: Hanifa is a resident of the city of Dangara.  She is 33 years old, married, and has five children.  For the past ten years she has been involved in retail business and she owns a store in which she sells food products.   As she would like to expand her assortment of goods, she is taking a loan to buy women's, men's and children's clothing.

loans.use: to buy women's, men's and children's clothing.

loans.name: Hozimo

texts.ru: Хочимо проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 51 год. Она вдова. У нее шестеро детей. Старший сын Хочимо находится на заработках за рубежом. Младший ее сын вместе с ней занимается торговлей. У Хочимо имеется торговая точка, где она продает мужскую одежду и обувь. Торговлей она занимается семь лет. Хочимо берет кредит для покупки зимней обуви и одежды.
texts.en: Hozimo lives in the Dangara district.  She is 51 years old and a widow.  She has six children.  Her oldest son is making a living abroad.  Her youngest works with her in retail.  Hozimo has a retail outlet where she sells men's clothing and shoes.  She has been involved in this activity for seven years.  She is taking a loan to buy winter shoes and clothes.

loans.use: to buy winter shoes and clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna is 56 years old, and is married with four children. She lives with her family in the village of Amistad. She is engaged in the poultry business; she raises chickens for sale. She has been in her business for twenty years and earns about PHP 150 per head. At this time, Myrna is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 8,000 to buy chickens and feed for them. She hopes that she can get the amount she has requested to further develop her business.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed for them

loans.name: Vinh

texts.en:
Vinh was born in 1962. She has two children. Her older child is married, and the younger is a computer repairer. She and her husband sell silver jewelry to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,500,000 VND per month. 

Vinh has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy more silver to make jewelry to sell in her shop.

loans.use: to buy more silver to make jewelry to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: Умедчон проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Умедчон имеет средне - специальное образование, он шафер. Умедчон более десяти лет работает таксистом. Он в основном предоставляет услугу по городу. Умедчон берет кредит для ремонта своего автомобиля.
texts.en: Umedjon lives in the city of Dangara.  He is 33 years old, married, and has five children.  He has a technical high school diploma.  For more than ten years now, he has been working as a taxi driver, mainly providing his services around the city.  He is taking a loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car.

loans.name: Al-Nour Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Nour and consists of four ladies. They live in Taiz, Yemen. All of them are responsible and honored to seek better lives for their families. They have requested a loan of 220,000 YER.
